title: Dawn of the Dead (1976) Ultimate Edition (Boxed Set)
description:
Dawn of the Dead (1976) Ultimate Edition (Boxed Set)

This is the a completely untouched bit for bit copy using ImgBrn. There are a total of 4 discs.
The discs are DVD9 and require a Dual-Layer DVDR to burn to.

U.S. Theatrical Version		7.54 GB
Extended Version		5.78 GB
European Version		5.76 GB
Documentaries			7.68 GB
